[h1] Почему не стоит покупать Dead by Daylight? [/h1]
[strike] Фанаты DBD с 8000 часами уже выехали за мной [/strike]
[hr][/hr]
Токсичное сообщество ( [b] Ожидайте взаимные поливы дерьмом [/b] )
[hr][/hr]
Дерьмовый анти-чит ( [b] Игроки с читами просто ломают хребет правилам игры и творят что хотят [/b] )
[hr][/hr]
Баланс игры постоянно колбасит ( [b] Нравится новый убийца? Ничего страшного, разработчики постараются занерфить его [/b] )
[hr][/hr]
С каждым обновлением всё больше багов. ( [b] То лицевую анимацию поломают, то убийцу заблокируют из-за бага который ломает его способность [/b] )
[hr][/hr]
Сама игра чёрти чем обросла. ( [b] Но если вы всегда мечтали играя за Леона убегать от Фредди Крюгера в Школе Мидвича, то это несомненно плюс [/b] )
i love this game decent
Prety good job so far (- one drop then i kill three surv)

(UPDATE 22.01.2022)
Das Spiel ist noch unfairer für die Spieler geworden. Die Bodenluke ist nun nichtmal mehr Sichtbar bevor nurnoch 1 Spieler lebt. Manche Killer können instant Downstaten, Mobbing ist Gefühlt eine Spielmechanik geworden mit Facecamping, Tunneling und Ausbluten lassen. Echt schade, wie kaputt das Spiel und seine Community ist.

Die Idee ist super, aber die Umsetzung ist eher mangelhaft....
Aktuell (09.06.2019) ist das Spiel für die Überlebenden einfach viel zu schwer. Der Killer kann quasi mit Camping das Team immernoch effektiv dezimieren oder einfach die Gruppe beim Fluchtversuch auseinandertreiben und dann am Ausgang campen. Die 5 Generatoren sind mindestens 1 zu viel oder halt einfach viel zu langsam. Manche Killer sind so stark, dass es als Spieler unmöglich ist zu entkommen.

Alles in einem ein zwar eigentlich lustiges Spiel mit aber sehr starken Balanceproblemen, daher von mir erstmal keine Empfehlung.

При всем обилии проблем, багов, ошибок, потерянных минут и часов ожидания, несуразиц и конфликтов, гнева, ненависти, нетерпения, отвращения, непонимания и ужаса (разумеется, не в том смысле, в каком того хотели разработчики) — игра по каким-то совершенно загадочным причинам [b]притягивает к себе[/b]. Стоит попробовать, и если игра [b]ваша[/b], вы уже не захотите ее забросить, какой бы плохой и багованной она ни казалась.

After around 1.2kh i think it is time to do a review. I will try to make it the most simple possible, feel free to leave a comment if you want to discuss more about it.

Positive points : 
=> An oppresive ambiance pretty decent.
=> Variety of survivors, killers, map, items, ...
=> The strongest survivors and killers are free and most of the transaction are for cosmetic.
=> The concept of the gamecore is simple for both side. For survivors : gen rush, Loop / mind game / stealth , for killers : chase, mind game,  hooking, gen pressure.
=> A game that can be play with friends.

Negative points : 
=> The gamecore is unbalance and penalize killers. The gamecore just ask two things in order to beat any killer or at least not depip : know the basis of the game and don't encounter lag / gamebreaking bug.
=> Following the previous point : the game use per to per system with the killer as host (which could lead to some trouble).
=>  You have still quite bug remaining (and some since one- two years). However you have big bugs and little one, hoppefully the little one are the majority.
=> The community of the game is really toxic : death threat, humiliation content, troll / sandbag ...
=> In both side, the gamecore allow some cheap strats who makes the game unfun : so far camping is the only one punnish directly, but it would be great to try to solve the causes of each problems since trying to punnish some ^^.
=> The content release is ... weird : at some point, you wonder how the team of devs release some content (as new killer for exemple) and didn't think about a few things (no offense here).
=> The game follow a road map (good point) but the road map follow some specific troubles and not necessary the big one. I mean i understand wanting to work to add new content in order to have more player but wouldn't that be better to actually try to rework the base of the game in order to make come back some old player and after that go further ?
=> Even if play with friends is fun there is a little problem sometimes : voice com... In a game that is not design for it, it can brougth some unbalance in a game that is already unbalance.
=> There is some troublewith the report system : most of the time they will ask you to make a video (so i hope you have a computer able to record and play at the same time). For others you can report with screenshoot (for exemple death threat) but be carefull to not take it and publish it through steam even if it is for report purpose (you could get problem with steam, you would need to put it private). Otherwise i don't have much to say as so far, i didn't have seen any effect of the report (except when i receive two myself for reporting people ^^ but that is another story that can't be discuss here ^^).

This is the short version of my feedback, so i can't give a reccomandation currently. But of course, depending how the game will evolve , i would maybe review my analysis. Also as i send to the devs, i am free to discuss with them and give them my feedback directly.

Edit : september 2021 : they add a new MMR system ... but it is brokeN

Edit : 2022 : EAC didn't work anymore, the number of cheater / hacker become insane ...

Creadores y Devs del puto juego de mierda llamado DBD, llevan años sin hacer un puto cambio mas que favorecer a una faccion del juego, no han logrado cambiar mas que el mismo modo de juego de mierda durante años, ahora pretenden nerfear aun mas cosas del juego que desde un comienzo eran asi y creen que la gente va a seguir jugando ya que no tienen competencia, solo hay que esperar que salga 1 juego diferente a esta mierda de ustedes y van a ver lo que le sucedera a su juego casi muerto, el % de killers al de survi es de 10 survis a 1/2 killer porque aburre una mierda desigualada de este nivel, jamas hacen nada util, ni se preocupan mas que por vender, son una compañia de mierda como todas las demas que solo espera lucrar, en especial ahora que se les estan yendo los players por su juego de mierda.

That is out of realistic!(Just my opinion)
-Perk´s that give you a big advantage!
-Some Killer´s seem to be Pay to Win for me cuz there ability´s!
-Sometimes you get hit around corners or just glitch back and get straight into the claws from the Killer!
-(And this Point is set to some Player´s with “Very huge Skill” that think camping in front of the Hook´s and don't move any step away is such involved with Skill!

[i]Don't get me wrong. It is a good Game, but it has his issues that need to get fixed how every Game does! But this is a Review, so I need to make sure what my Points are![/i]

[u]It is still a very good Game and I'll keep playing it![/u] Rate:8.6/10

Amazing game and a toxic community. And as a huge toxic person myself, I'm gonna tell you why I love it.  I remember playing this game back in 2016 on the first week it came out and got bored of it after 80 hours. Came back to it at 2019, toxic flashlight bms and teabagging and the most important one - post match game chat. < best thing added ever in this game, the fact that you can be as toxic as you want in the post game chat is what makes this enjoyable the most. Looping a killer for 4 gens and in the post-game chat writing "gg ez, baby <insert killer name>" and knowing that they read it, don't respond and just leave the lobby is so satisfying. Over the past month I got 200-ish hours on this game just cause of the toxicity, though pls fix the hit boxes, especially huntresess hatchets. 

Summmary: If ur toxic and u like being a part of the toxic community, this game is for you.

Edit: 2020-11-05: Nothing changed. My review still stands the same.

Dead by Daylight ist eines der besten Spiele die ich je gespielt habe. Durch die regelmäßig neu erscheinenden Chapter wird es nie langweilig und bleibt unterhaltend. Die Community ist angenehm im Vergleich zu vielen anderen online multiplayer Spielen. Ich habe sehr viel Lebenszeit mit diesem Spiel verbracht und viele Leute kennengelernt. Dafür möchte ich mit dieser Review bedanken!

I first bought this game as a fan of horror and looking for something new to play. At first I loved the game and couldn't get over the game as both a survivor and a killer, but looking at it now after a while it became very stale and tiring. I honestly don't have any fun with the game anymore due to the community, it's very toxic. Honestly the game feels like a competition to which side can cry the loudest to get the game developers attention. Complaining about perks, killer powers, items, and map layouts. I know for a fact the game will never be as balanced as players want it to be, but they don't get that and it gets annoying. Plus the toxic trash talk post game or even player's behaviors in game start to just ware me down. 

I've had my fun, made it to red and killed whoever got in my sight, and I think I'm just burnt out. Unless you have friends to play with (which I don't), I honestly do not recommend this game anymore. It will get boring fast and start to annoy you. I can't play a game where I legit felt like I had no fun during a session, I just felt blank.

Don't get me wrong. This is an awesome game to play with your friends. A fun game where 4 survivors go against 1 killer. Seems like it could be fair when first hearing about it, but trust me... It's not. You will get face camped (Killer just stays on you while your hooked preventing other people from saving you), One shot constantly by the one shot killers because they know it's broken too, or farmed by other survivors so they can get blood points (Unhooking you while being chased by the killer, or near killer, which basically lets the killer down you again, which can lead to your death very quickly.). Game is really fun, but shit like this just makes me want my refund.

Это было в 2019, сейчас в конце 2020 года мнение об игре изменилось в худшую сторону: я никогда не ныл насчет читеров или багов - их было немного. Сейчас же игра катится на дно. С каждым патчем увеличивается количество багов, игра крашится, вылеты из лобби, зайдя в игру тебе пишут "невозможно соединение", невозможно кинуть инвайт другу, застревание в текстурах. Такое впечатление, что разрабы лишь заняты распилом доната, выпуская лишь новые скинчики, очередных манов и сурвов. Такими темпами всякое желание играть в дбд скоро пропадет вовсе
